oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Measuring quality in vegetables using electrochemical methods and nutritional values
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jurica, Milos
Petrikova, Kristina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The work was to assess the quality of the broccoli variety 'Belstar F1' and the radish variety 'Jarola F1' when grown by both organic and conventional methods. Quality was measured using electrochemical values (pH, redox potential and electrical conductivity) and the derived P-values, levels of vitamin C, mineral content, dry matter and roughage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jurica, Milos and Petrikova, Kristina (2008) Measuring quality in vegetables using electrochemical methods and nutritional values. In: Proceedings XIII. International Conference Electrochemical Quality Test, Brno.
